modules:
package test

p.q.r := 1

p.q[s] := 2 if s := "s"

package test

p.q.r := 1

p.q[s] := 2 if s := "r"

package test

a.b.c.p := 1

q := 0

a.b.d := 3

p if {
	q == 0
	a.b.c.p == 1
	a.b.d == 3
}

package test

a.b contains x if some x in [1, 2, 3]

package test

a.b[x] := i if some i, x in [1, 2, 3]

package test

a.b.c.d contains 1
package test.a

b.c.d contains 2

package test

q[7] := 8

a[x] if q[x]

package test

q[7] := 8 if false

a[x] if q[x]

package test

a.b.c := "d"

a.b.e := "f"

a.b.g contains x if some x in numbers.range(1, 3)

a.b.h[x] := 1 if x := "one"

package test

p[a][b][c][d][e] if {
	some a in numbers.range(1, 5)
	some b in numbers.range(1, 5)
	some c in numbers.range(1, 5)
	some d in numbers.range(1, 5)
	some e in numbers.range(1, 5)
	(((a + b) + c) + d) + e == 24
}
